title: Love Live! Superstar!!
synopsis: Everyone has a dream they strive to achieve, and so does the musically talented Kanon Shibuya. However, due to her stage fright, Kanon fails to make it into Yuigaoka Girls' High School's music program and instead ends up in the general curriculum. Even though Kanon makes the conscious decision to quit music altogether, her classmate Tang Keke rekindles Kanon's passion for music with her own: a passion for school idols.
related_anime: ['Love Live! Superstar!! Futari no jikan! ~Special times~ Kanon & koi hen', 'Love Live! School Idol Project', 'Love Live! Superstar!! 2nd Season']
